categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Blink was the nickname of a male Bothan who served as a member of the galaxywide anti-slavery organization Freedom Flight. In 44 ABY, he met with journalist Madhi Vaandt, who was running a segment for The Perre Needmo Newshour on existing slavery practices throughout the galaxy, on the moon of the planet Vartos. There, he revealed that Freedom Flight was not behind the recent revolt on Klatooine. He then tipped Vaandt off to head to Blaudu Sextus.
